result.markdown:
--- title: "Compute & Storage Resources at SLU" format: html: theme: cosmo toc: true toc-depth: 3 --- # Access to Compute and Storage Resources This page provides an overview of how to apply for compute and storage resources through NAISS/SUPR, what systems are available, how to manage your allocation, and where to get support. ## How to Apply
Step 1: Apply for a NAISS/SUPR Account Step 2: Apply for Resources via \"SLU Local 2025\" Step 3: Access After Approval
## Available Systems The following systems can be requested: - **Gorilla** - **Pelle** - **Lutra** **[MORE INFO NEEDED: Add optional system descriptions]** ## Termination of Allocations Allocations must be terminated or renewed when no longer needed. The exact procedure remains **[MORE INFO NEEDED]**. Questions pending confirmation: - Is termination handled through SUPR? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Is a one‑month notice period required? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Should users notify NAISS, SLU IT, or both? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** ## Pricing Billing follows the NAISS/Uppmax pricing model, but will be send out, and paid to SLU-IT. ## Pricing (live from UPPMAX) The table below is fetched directly from the official [UPPMAX Terms and fees](https://www.uu.se/en/centre/uppmax/get-started/terms-and-fees) page at render time. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Service Pelle Pelle Cloud Maja
CPU 0.10 SEK/core-hour 0.12 SEK/core-hour 0.14 SEK/core-hour
CPU High-memory 0.40 SEK/core-timme 0.50 SEK/core-timme 0.60 SEK/core-hour
GPU Small* 0.40 SEK/GPU-hour 0.50 SEK/GPU-hour 0.60 SEK/GPU-hour
GPU Medium** 2.75 SEK/GPU-hour 3.2 SEK/GPU-hour 4 SEK/GPU-hour
GPU H100 11.50 SEK/GPU-hour 14 SEK/GPU-hour 16.50 SEK/GPU-hour
Gorilla 0.10 SEK/TB-hour 0.12 SEK/TB-hour 0.15 SEK/TB-hour
Lutra*** 500 SEK/TB-year N/A N/A
Consulting 800 SEK/hour 800 SEK/hour 800 SEK/hour
````` ::: ::: *** Lutra is sold in increments of 50 TB, 4 year minimum ### Example: Annual cost for a small project Based on the [UPPMAX price list](https://www.uu.se/en/centre/uppmax/get-started/terms-and-fees). #### Storage on Gorilla - Data volume: **2 TB** - Price: **0.1 SEK per TB-hour** - Calculation: *2 TB × 365 days × 24 hours/day × 0.1 SEK/TB-hour* - **Annual storage cost: 1,752 SEK** #### Compute on Pelle - Compute use: **24,000 core-hours** - Price: **0.1 SEK per core-hour** - Calculation: *24,000 × 0.1 SEK* - **Annual compute cost: 2,400 SEK** #### **Total annual cost** **4,152 SEK** --- ### Example: Annual cost for long term data storage Based on the [UPPMAX price list](https://www.uu.se/en/centre/uppmax/get-started/terms-and-fees). Please remember that Lutra is sold in increments of 50 TB, at 4 year minimum. #### Storage on Lutra - Data volume: **50 TB** - Price: **500 SEK per TB-year** - Calculation: *50 TB × 500 SEK/TB-year* - **Annual storage cost: 2,500 SEK** ## Payment Process The payment process is currently **[MORE INFO NEEDED]**. Points to clarify: - Who issues the invoice? NAISS/Uppmax or internal SLU? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Where does the researcher enter a project number or cost center? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Is internal SLU invoicing used? **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** ## Support For questions about accounts, applications, or technical issues, contact: **itsupport@slu.se**
